pages.title: About
pages.text: About MeHi,I am a middle student and developer from Guangdong,Shaoguan.I only konw C++ now,but I will learn Python and Golang in the future.My Github Stats:(Powered by github-readme-stats) About The BlogPowered by:Hexo:A fast, simple & powerful blog framework.Generate my blogâ€™s html & javascript files.Icarus:A theme of Hexo.Itâ€™s very fast although in mainland China.Cloudflare Pages:Offers static web hosting and other exciting stuff.Itâ€™s very slow in mainland China,but it wonâ€™t block by Chinahe.Staticfile CDN:Static file hosting.Fast in the world although in mainland China.Visual Studio Code:I use it to do something interestingğŸ™ƒ.
